steps.title: 01. Presale Process
steps.description: The presale process, which is live now, allows buyers to purchase SNMI tokens pre-listing, ensuring the lowest possible price. At each phase of the presale, the price increases. Staking is also an option for presale buyers looking to maximize.

steps.title: 02. TGE, Bridge & Listings
steps.description: Post presale, the SNMI token will be deployed on multiple chains allowing presale buyers to bridge their tokens to the SoNami layer 2 blockchain. The token will be available to trade on both Centralized and Decentralized exchanges.

steps.title: 03. SoNami Deployment
steps.description: SoNami is what Solana has sorely needed. An L2 reducing congestion, downtime, and even increasing speed. It builds upon the beauty of Solana, while making it more scalable with the increase in volume, making it the clear cut solution to take the ecosystem into the future..

1.title: 01. Get Wallet
1.description: You’re gonna need a wallet to hold your $SNMI. There are lots of great ones that are compatible! We recommend Best Wallet for simplicity sake.

2.title: 02. Add Crypto
2.description: If you're looking to swap crypto for $SNMI, you're going to need some! Use your desired exchange for that, or if paying by card, simply select that option.

3.title: 03. Stacking
3.description: You can choose to stake your tokens during the presale. The APY is substantial and dynamic, meaning the more people stake, it changes!

dialog.title: How to Buy
steps: Install Phantom or MetaMask, create a new wallet, and save the seed phrase. Add the Solana network via “Add Network” if you're using MetaMask.
If you want to change the payment token, click on the token icon to change it.
Input the amount you want to spend or the the amount of SNMI Tokens you want to buy. Make sure that your wallet balance has a sufficient amount to cover the purchase and gas fees.
Click "Buy SNMI". Approve the transaction in your wallet. Check your SNMI Tokens in the "SNMI Balance" field.

faqs.title: What is SONAMI?
faqs.description: SoNami is the next evolution in Layer 2 technology, delivering epic customization, efficiency, and performance. It neutralizes the Solana pain points: network congestion, failed transactions, and scalability limitations, while amplifying the strengths of Solana.

faqs.title: How Do I Stake?
faqs.description: Staking SNMI is simple. During the presale, participants can choose to stake their tokens to earn additional rewards. After purchasing SNMI, follow the staking instructions provided on the platform to lock your tokens and maximize your yield.

leftBottomBox.title: What is soNAMI?
leftBottomBox.description: SoNami is the next evolution in Layer 2 technology, delivering epic customization, efficiency, and performance. It neutralizes the Solana pain points: network congestion, failed transactions, and scalability limitations, while amplifying the strengths of Solana.

1.title: SoNami: The Best New Cryptocurrency
1.description: Experience seamless performance with our Solana Layer 2, optimized for speed and scalability, while enjoying the robust liquidity and compatibility of our multi-chain token on Solana.

2.title: Lightning-Fast Trading
2.description: Whether you're deploying a DeFi app or trading memecoins, SoNami’s off-chain execution and parallel processing deliver ultra-low latency and near-instant finality — even under extreme demand.

3.title: Zero Down-Time
3.description: SuspeDuring times of high-traffic, Solana has notoriously seen times of failed transactions, network congestion, and even down time. Sonami scalability and off-chain execution solves that

4.title: Meme Coin Galaxy
4.description: Meme coins are driving the solana, and some would say the entire blockchain industry forward. Sonami customizability and transaction bundling make high volume trading infinitely scalable, ensuring the best meme coin experience.
